description: Poorly structured prompts demonstrating what to avoid

examples.name: bad-ex1
examples.description: Flat structure with no hierarchy or detail
anti_patterns: All tags at same level (no hierarchy)
Poor naming convention (doesn't match xxx-xxx-xxx pattern)
why_its_bad: Impossible to understand what the prompt should do
how_to_fix: Add proper tag hierarchy (nest contextual details)
Replace vague content with specific descriptions

examples.name: incomplete-prompt
anti_patterns: Comments noting missing sections (instead of actual content)
why_its_bad: No way to know what output should look like
how_to_fix: Include 2+ good examples and 1+ bad example

common_anti_patterns.flat_structure: All tags at same level with no nesting
common_anti_patterns.vague_content: Generic placeholders like 'do the thing', 'process data'
common_anti_patterns.poor_examples: Unrealistic examples like 'Input: data, Output: result'
common_anti_patterns.no_constraints: Missing boundaries and edge case handling
common_anti_patterns.undefined_output: No clear specification of output structure

usage_notes: Use these examples to understand what NOT to do. When validating prompts, check for these anti-patterns and provide specific feedback on how to fix them.
